mapper.update:
update sys_division
DIV_NAME = #{divName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIV_PHONE = #{divPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIV_ADR = #{divAdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DIV_ID = #{divId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_division set DIV_NAME = #{divName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIV_PHONE = #{divPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIV_ADR = #{divAdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CO_ID = #{coId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIV_DESC = #{divDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTMOD = #{lastmod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DIV_ID = #{divId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
